QuestData.Title: She Loves Me, She Loves Me NOT!
QuestData.Description: Oh, sweetie! You're never going to guess who's down in the slave pits to the north.$B$B<Sassy shakes her head sadly at you.>$B$BCandy's down there, and she's working for the Trade Prince. She dropped you like a bad habit and now she's working for the other team. but it gets worse. Since you "dealt" with Chip, she's dating the Trade Prince!$B$BI don't know about you, but if she were my ex, I'd rip her fickle heart right out of her chest.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Carve the Fickle Heart out of her chest!
QuestData.LogDescription: Rip the Fickle Heart from out of Candy Cane's chest.
QuestData.CompletionText: What did you decide to do, hon?
QuestData.RewardText: I'm sure she deserved it, $n. She should never have betrayed you like that.$B$BIt gives me the shivers to think that she might have kissed that monster, the Trade Prince!
